title: Land for Sale in Pothuarawa road, Malabe.
details:
Prime Residential Land for Sale in Pothuarawa road, Malabe one of the rapid developing area. East access to Malabe, Battramulla and Pelawatte main cities.

- Mostly suitable for a residential purpose.
- Calm & safe environment.
- Good neighborhood
- Very clear boundary

Less than 3.5 km to Southern Highway, Athurugiriya Expressway Interchange.
